description:
Watching the colorful fireflies is so much fun, Dot wants to be a firefly, too! 
Help Dot pretend to be a firefly!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn the lights off then automatically turn on two eye lights.
Make Dot automatically loop the eye ring states to look like a pair of flapping wings.
puzzles.introduction: Let's give Dot a pair of wings!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the Eye Ring states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: Make Dot use a listener to turn on orange lights every 2.0 s. After turning on orange lights, make Dot automatically turn the lights off again.
puzzles.introduction: Every firefly needs a blinking light!

hints.description: Link the Listener to the Orange light using a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s. Link the Orange light to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot pretend to be a firefly. Hold Dot and pretend to fly around. Let Dot blink the light three times.
